qas.question: What makes the Papalote children's museum so famous?
Where is the Papalote Children's Museum located?
What is the largest amusement park in Latin America?
What borough is Six Flags Mexico located?
What city has the largest outdoor ice skating rink in the world?

context: The Papalote children's museum, which houses the <a0_0>world's largest dome screen<a0_0/>, is located in the <a1_0>wooded park of Chapultepec<a1_0/>, near the Museo Tecnológico, and La Feria amusement park. The theme park <a2_0>Six Flags México<a2_0/> (the largest amusement park in Latin America) is located in the Ajusco neighborhood, in <a3_0>Tlalpan<a3_0/> borough, southern Mexico City. During the winter, the main square of the Zócalo is transformed into a gigantic ice skating rink, which is said to be the largest in the world behind that of <a4_0>Moscow<a4_0/>'s Red Square.
